overview: Inspired by the ceiling paintings of the old churches in Cebu and abroad like the Sistine Chapel, a parish priest in Bantayan Island embarks on his own ceiling painting project of epic proportions with the help of a ragtag bunch of artists on an evangelical mission through visual catechism.
tagline: A documentary on the Dibuho-Kisame Project of Sts. Peter and Paul Church in Bantayan Island
title: Masterpiece
